/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with lush green trees, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on either side. Power lines crisscross above, adding a touch of urban charm to the scene. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, hinting at the rhythm of city life. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
